creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: book with pale blue cover featuring a variety of images of stylized flowers, trees, flower baskets, calligraphy, and a few images of Buddhist gods of good fortune
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
signed: in images: [Playfully painted by the recluse from the capital, Kyoto, Shisui Shinsei at age 80]; [Painted by the eremite from the flowering capital, Shisui Shinsei at age 81]
title: Collected Works of Kenzan's Designs (Kenzan iboku (乾山遺墨)
